lines.text:
[to Olivia]
I just don't understand you women. You don't behave like men.

[to Vic]
Well, look, I know a couple that...
Hey, are you press or TV?
Oh, nothing so romantic. I'm an anthropologist.
Well, we all have to do something.

[about Vic's choice of the band's name]
Sure! I dig it. We're too much! We're Toomorrow!
Are they well known on Earth?
It is unlikely. They seem too clean and pleasant.
I'm here with Karl Chambers, the Toomorrow group.
I don't suppose you're his road manager?
No, I'm his number one chick!
There's room for all types of music, Amy.
Yes, but that doesn't mean that I have to keep playing second-fiddle to a bloody Tonalizer!
